books.author: by James Patterson and David Ellis
books.description: Searching for her sister’s killer, a former F.B.I. researcher finds a link between scores of unsolved cases.
books.name: INVISIBLE

books.author: by Janet Evanovich
books.description: The New Jersey bounty hunter Stephanie Plum pursues a dealer who sells more than used cars.
books.name: TOP SECRET TWENTY-ONE

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: Love blossoms between a widowed doctor in Thunder Point, Ore., and the physician’s assistant applying for a job at his clinic.
books.name: THE PROMISE

books.author: by Robert Galbraith
books.description: The private detective Cormoran Strike steps in when the author of a roman à clef set in literary London is murdered; by J. K. Rowling, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: THE SILKWORM

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: Swanson, part of an elite, family-run task force, is called upon to protect a supermodel.
books.name: WHEN DAY BREAKS

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: After a family tragedy, a P.R. executive keeps everyone in Fool’s Gold, Calif., at arm’s length. That includes the employee who has feelings for him.
books.name: UNTIL WE TOUCH

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A driver plows into a crowd at a job fair, killing eight. The killer then taunts a suicidal ex-cop, who must stop a deadlier attack.
books.name: MR. MERCEDES

books.author: by Jennifer Weiner
books.description: A woman becomes addicted to pain medication.
books.name: ALL FALL DOWN

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Karin Slaughter
books.description: In Atlanta in 1974, two women cops, both with something to prove, join in the search for a serial killer who is targeting the police.
books.name: COP TOWN

books.author: by Diana Gabaldon
books.description: In the eighth Outlander time-traveling romance, Jamie Fraser and his family face challenges in the 18th and 20th centuries.
books.name: WRITTEN IN MY OWN HEART'S BLOOD

books.author: by Alice Clayton
books.description: Caroline and Simon negotiate their new relationship while house-sitting in Sausalito; Book 2 of the Cocktail series.
books.name: RUSTY NAILED

books.author: by Christina Baker Kline
books.description: A historical novel about orphans swept off the streets of New York and sent to the Midwest in the 1920s.
books.name: ORPHAN TRAIN

books.author: by Fern Michaels
books.description: When a string of anonymous emails suggests shady dealings at an assisted-living facility, the Sisterhood members Myra Rutledge and Annie de Silva are ready to beat a con artist at his own game.
books.name: KISS AND TELL
